EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Boot and JRebel 6.0 7AM.Confirmation 1 SD
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Spring Boot and JRebel 6.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Boot and JRebel 6.0. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, November 20, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=668193154> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 668 193 154 Thank you,
